post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, March 30
post.Content:
A very quiet week this week. One thing to note is that the JavaOne call for proposals is now open - so get your proposals in today!

JavaFX

  • Ren√© Jahn has posted about 'JavaFX FlowPane vs. FXFluidFlowPane'.
  • The Gluon folks have released Scene Builder Kit, as well as a 64-bit build of Scene Builder.
  • Dirk Lemmerman has created a new website for his CalendarFX project, which matches the FlexGanttFX website he has previously published.

That's all! Catch you next week :-)
